EXPLANATION.TITLE: A short Explanation
EXPLANATION.DESCRIPTION: You probably ask yourself - what are logical gates? In a nutshell logical gates are the components that make up the processing unit of a computer. However, this explanation is a bit short, which is why we animated this short video to explain the basics needed to use our website.

EXAMPLES.TITLE: A few example circuits for you...

LAYOUT.TITLE: Editor Layout
LAYOUT.DESCRIPTION: This tutorial points out the possibilities of the editors layout and sums up the entirety of its  functionality.

EDIT_MODE.TITLE: Edit Mode
EDIT_MODE.DESCRIPTION: Get to know the basics of the edit-mode. In this Tutorial we address all the principles from placing a component to creating a user-defined component.

SIMULATION_MODE.TITLE: Simulation Mode
SIMULATION_MODE.DESCRIPTION: The simulation-mode offers a bunch of possibilities and even if you loose orientation at some point, this tutorial will help to get back on the right path.
